headline: EPAM and BOSS Unveil a Revolutionary Immersive Spatial Experience, Powered by Apple Vision Pro, That Redefines Motorsport Fandom
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM), a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company, today announced its strategic collaboration with BOSS on a revolutionary immersive spatial experience, powered by Apple Vision Pro, that redefines motorsport fandom. This innovation brings fans into the adrenaline-fueled immersion and the heart of the race action.
